definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Here I use it as the localization pack manager in presentation programs.
sentences.chinese: 這裏，我用它作爲表示程序中的本地化包管理器。

sentences.english: A localisation project comprises several steps and involves many participants.
sentences.chinese: 本地化項目需要經過多個步驟，涉及到多個參與者。

sentences.english: These localization pack changes do not affect how the system runs.
sentences.chinese: 這些本地化包的更改不會影響系統的運行方式。

sentences.english: Gets the non-localized name for an event opcode.
sentences.chinese: 獲取事件操作碼的本地化名稱。

sentences.english: The functional logic and localization framework are abstracted into a handler class.
sentences.chinese: 功能邏輯和本地化框架被抽象到處理程序類中。

sentences.english: Each of these localized assemblies contains only resources and no code.
sentences.chinese: 每個本地化程序集只包含資源，不包含代碼。

sentences.english: English has been indigenized in different parts of the world.
sentences.chinese: 英語在世界的不同地方被本地化了。

sentences.english: Gets the non-localized name of the event task.
sentences.chinese: 獲取事件任務的非本地化名稱。

sentences.english: You don't need to separate this into two strings in localization packs.
sentences.chinese: 您不必將本地化包中這樣的句子拆成兩個字符串。

sentences.english: Western developers must also consider the need to localize apps in Asian countries.
sentences.chinese: 西方開發者也必須考慮應用在亞洲國家的本地化。

sentences.english: All other components are capsulated in the root element and localized.
sentences.chinese: 所有其他組件都封裝在根元素中，均已本地化。

sentences.english: First, labor power and parts of the machine, companies should realize these problems in local area.
sentences.chinese: 實現己力取零件購購的本地化。

sentences.english: Mr Mugabe says that indigenisation “recognises our sovereign right of ownership”.
sentences.chinese: 穆加貝先生稱本地化是“承認我們擁有的主權權利”。

sentences.english: A mini-Shetland stallion was referred with bilateral pruritus localized to the anterior neck.
sentences.chinese: 小型設德蘭馬被稱爲瘙癢本地化與雙邊的前頸部。

sentences.english: The localization pack is one of the key elements in the globalization architecture.
sentences.chinese: 本地化包是全球化體系結構中的關鍵元素之一。

sentences.english: This is mainly used in localisation.

definition: deep plowing/thorough penetration/thorough development (of a market segment etc)
to be in operation/to do business/(of train, bus etc) to be in service/operation/service
